question: A landscaper works for 3 weeks every month and for 6 days every week. If he gets paid $190 every day, how much does he earn if he works for a year?
answer:
The landscaper works for 6 days every week and works for 3 weeks every month so he works for 6 days/week * 3 weeks/month = <<6*3=18>>18 days/month
If he earns $190 every day he then earns $190/day * 18 days/month = $<<190*18=3420>>3420/month
A year is equal to 12 months so every year he earns $3420/month * 12 months/year = $<<3420*12=41,040>>41,040
#### 41,040
